actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act amending the Bretton Woods Agreement Act to require, beginning with fiscal year 1980, the total outlays of the Federal Government to not exceed its receipts.

summary.text: Requires that beginning with fiscal year 1980, the total budget outlays of the Federal Government shall not exceed its receipts.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act amending the Bretton Woods Agreement Act to require, beginning with fiscal year 1980, the total outlays of the Federal Government to not exceed its receipts.
